alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 6:17PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jewell, northeastern Smith, western Nuckolls and Webster Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 617 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Red Cloud to near Guide Rock to near Burr Oak. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and isolated pockets of hail up to around penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Red Cloud, Lawrence, Guide Rock, Burr Oak, Cowles, Bostwick, Rosemont and Inavale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
